ovdesc.p: This application is to update one or more RC.DETAIL
Pending RC.DETAIL transaction can be terminated through this application
Clears the old existing authorised record, when a new record is created with the same id as that of old authorised record

desc.p: Valid account no
For which pending transactions (RC.DETAIL ids) exists
Specifies the RC.DETAIL record to be updated
Valid RC.DETAIL record
The RC.DETAIL id should be present in RC.PENDING.TXNS
Specifies what type of change is to be done on RC.DETAIL
Allowed change types are
STATUS
FREQ
RETRY.ATTEMPT
RETRY.PERIOD
RETRY.OPTIONS
Currently only STATUS change is allowed
Specifies the value of each change type
For Status only 'TERMINATE' is allowed
When one of the change type is 'STATUS' and has value as 'TERMINATE'
Then other change types are not allowed
Specifies the reason to modify the RC.DETAIL record
Change reason can be a free text
This is a multi valued field.
Contains details of any override applicable to this record.
A maximum of 35 characters may be entered. This is a NOINPUT field.
